text: Ani sarvacya sarva allahasamora ubhe rahatila. Tya veli kamajora loka ghamendi lokanna mhanatila ki amhi tara tumacya adhina hoto, tara kaya tumhi allahacya siksa-yatanammadhuna thodi saja amacyavaruna dura karu sakanare ahata? Te uttara detila ki jara allahane amhala margadarsana kele asate tara amhihi tumhala marga dakhavila asata. Ata tara amacyasathi becaina hone ani saburi rakhane donhi sarakheca ahe. Amacyakarita sutakeca konatahi marga nahi
